vista.graph
Class Symbol

java.lang.Object
  vista.graph.GraphicElement
      vista.graph.Symbol
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, Animate, Bounded, Drawable
Direct Known Subclasses:
CircleSymbol
public class Symbol
extends GraphicElement

Symbol is a polygon shape drawn with respect to the x and y coordinates of rectangle. No scaling is currently done.

The symbol is a polygon and can be represented by a series of x and y coordinates. The symbol may be filled or outlined. The x and y coordinates are taken to be in units of pixels ~ 1/72 inch for most displays.

Version:
$Id: Symbol.java,v 1.1 2003/10/02 20:49:08 redwood Exp $
Author:
Nicky Sandhu

hitsDrawing

public boolean hitsDrawing(int x,
                           int y)
true if x,y hits the drawing. More precise than contains(x,y)

Overrides:
hitsDrawing in class GraphicElement

Draw

public void Draw()
draws polygon representing symbol. Currently for efficiency no scaling is done. However a subclass will do so. In this way it would be the users choice to use the most suitable class.
